short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open a small window with Sudoku iframe.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Sudoku game has three modes: 4x4 (small), 9x9 (medium), 16x16 (large). And each mode has 3 kinds of difficulty to choose from, suitable for players of all levels.
